import { PaystackButton } from 'react-paystack' import React, { useState } from "react" const Paystack = () => { const publicKey = "pk_your_public_key_here" const amount = 1000000 const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [name, setName] = useState("") const [phone, setPhone] = useState("") const componentProps = { email, amount, metadata: { name, phone, }, publicKey, text: "Pay Now", onSuccess: () => alert("Thanks for doing business with us! Come back soon!!"), onClose: () => alert("Wait! Don't leave :("), } return (

Dancing Shoes

{amount}

setName(e.target.value)} /> setEmail(e.target.value)} /> setPhone(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Paystack;
